<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Nightmare](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=447)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 238 <sup>1.1</sup>

Nightmares are flaming equine harbingers of death.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Greater Nightmare](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3106) (Creature 11), [Nightmare](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3105) (Creature 6)

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Nightmare Steeds</title>

Nightmares allow only the evilest of creatures to ride them and are willing partners in the destruction those creatures inflict. Powerful [dullahans](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2964) are particularly well known to associate with nightmares.
</aside>
